titlStmt.titl: 2022 South and Southeast Asia Survey Metadata File
2022 South and Southeast Asia Survey Metadata File

stdyInfo.abstract: Metadata for the Religion in South and Southeast Asia survey conducted by Pew Research Center in 2022

fileTxt.fileName: SEA Religion Public Data - Pew Research Center (All Vars) January 2024.sav

var.name: QRID
var.labl: QRID. Respondent ID (UNIQUE TO EACH RESPONDENT)

var.name: weight
var.labl: Final Weight

var.name: COUNTRY
var.labl: COUNTRY. COUNTRY ID (UNIQUE TO EACH COUNTRY)

var.name: DEMONYM
var.labl: DEMONYM. DEMONYM

var.name: Q1
var.labl: Q1. Thinking about your current personal economic situation, how would you describe it?

var.name: QSPKrec
var.labl: QSPKrec. Which of these two statements is closest to your opinion even if neither is exactly right?

catgry.labl: People should be allowed to speak their opinions publicly even if they upset other people
Harmony with others is more important than the right to speak one's opinion

var.name: QCRITrec
var.labl: QCRITrec. Do you think people who disagree with our government's actions should or should not be able to publicy criticize the government?

catgry.labl: Yes, should be able to publicly criticize the government
No, should not be able to publicly criticize the government

var.name: QGOVrec
var.labl: QGOVrec. Some feel that we should rely on a democatic form of government to solve [COUNTRY]'s problems. Others feel that we should rely on a leader with a strong hand to solve [COUNTRY]'s problems. Which comes closer to your opinion?

var.name: QCURREL
var.labl: QCURREL. [Regardless of how the government records your religion,] what is your religion, if any?

catgry.labl: Chinese traditional religions, such as Dao, Confucian or Chinese local religions [DO NOT READ IN SRI LANKA [COUNTRY≠6]
Local beliefs or Indigenous religions [DO NOT READ IN SRI LANKA]

var.name: Q15a
var.labl: Q15a. Just based on what you know, do you think each of the following descriptions fits [RELSYS], or not? a. a family tradition one must follow

var.name: Q15b
var.labl: Q15b. Just based on what you know, do you think each of the following descriptions fits [RELSYS], or not? b. an ethnicity one is born into

var.name: Q15c
var.labl: Q15c. Just based on what you know, do you think each of the following descriptions fits [RELSYS], or not? c. a culture one is part of

var.name: Q15d
var.labl: Q15d. Just based on what you know, do you think each of the following descriptions fits [RELSYS], or not? d. a religion one chooses to follow

var.name: Q25a
var.labl: Q25a. In your opinion, can a person be truly [RELSING] if they do each of the following things? a. do not respect elders

var.name: Q25b
var.labl: Q25b. In your opinion, can a person be truly [RELSING] if they do each of the following things? b. do not respect [COUNTRY]

var.name: Q25c
var.labl: Q25c. In your opinion, can a person be truly [RELSING] if they do each of the following things? c. do not believe in God

var.name: Q25d
var.labl: Q25d. In your opinion, can a person be truly [RELSING] if they do each of the following things? d. do not respect deities or spirits

var.name: Q25e
var.labl: Q25e. In your opinion, can a person be truly [RELSING] if they do each of the following things? e. never go to [temple, pagoda or dhamma hall/temple/temple/mosque/church”]

var.name: Q25f
var.labl: Q25f. In your opinion, can a person be truly [RELSING] if they do each of the following things? f. do not pray

var.name: Q25g
var.labl: Q25g. In your opinion, can a person be truly [RELSING] if they do each of the following things? g. drink alcohol

var.name: Q25h
var.labl: Q25h. In your opinion, can a person be truly [RELSING] if they do each of the following things? h. celebrate the Buddhist festival of [Vesak/Pchum ben]

var.name: Q25i
var.labl: Q25i. In your opinion, can a person be truly [RELSING] if they do each of the following things? i. celebrate the Christian festival of Christmas

var.name: Q25j
var.labl: Q25j. In your opinion, can a person be truly [RELSING] if they do each of the following things? j. celebrate the Muslim festival of Eid

var.name: Q25k
var.labl: Q25k. In your opinion, can a person be truly [RELSING] if they do each of the following things? k. make offerings to spirits of deceased relatives

var.name: QATTEND
var.labl: QATTEND. [Aside from weddings and funerals,] how often, if at all, do you [go to temple, pagoda or dhamma hall/go to temple/attend mosque/go to church]?

var.name: Q26a
var.labl: Q26a. Do you feel a personal connection to each of the following ways of life, or not? a. The Buddhist way of life

var.name: Q26b
var.labl: Q26b. Do you feel a personal connection to each of the following ways of life, or not? b. The Muslim way of life

var.name: Q26c
var.labl: Q26c. Do you feel a personal connection to each of the following ways of life, or not? c. The Christian way of life

var.name: Q26d
var.labl: Q26d. Do you feel a personal connection to each of the following ways of life, or not? d. The Hindu way of life

var.name: Q26e
var.labl: Q26e. Do you feel a personal connection to each of the following ways of life, or not? e. The Chinese traditional way of life

var.name: Q26f
var.labl: Q26f. Do you feel a personal connection to each of the following ways of life, or not? f. Local religions'/indigenous religions' way of life

var.name: Q28
var.labl: Q28. How important is religion in your life, if at all?

var.name: QGODa
var.labl: QGODa. Do you believe in God, or not?

var.name: QGODb
var.labl: QGODb. How certain are you about this belief, if at all?

var.name: QGODc
var.labl: QGODc. Do you think that there are unseen beings in the world, like deities or spirits?

var.name: QGODd
var.labl: QGODd. How certain are you, if at all, about the existence of unseen beings in the world?

var.name: Q34
var.labl: Q34. Which statement comes closer to your view even if neither is exactly right?

catgry.labl: My religion is the only true religion

var.name: QCHREL
var.labl: QCHREL. Thinking about when you were a child, in what religion were you raised, if any?

catgry.labl: Chinese traditional religions, such as Dao, Confucian or Chinese local religions [DO NOT READ IN SRI LANKA [COUNTRY≠6]
Local beliefs or Indigenous religions [DO NOT READ IN SRI LANKA]

var.name: QFIGURESa
var.labl: QFIGURESa. Do you currently pray or offer your respects to each of the following figures, or not? a. Ganesh

var.name: QFIGURESb
var.labl: QFIGURESb. Do you currently pray or offer your respects to each of the following figures, or not? b. Buddha

var.name: QFIGURESc
var.labl: QFIGURESc. Do you currently pray or offer your respects to each of the following figures, or not? c. Shiva

var.name: QFIGURESd
var.labl: QFIGURESd. Do you currently pray or offer your respects to each of the following figures, or not? d. Mother Mary

var.name: QFIGURESe
var.labl: QFIGURESe. Do you currently pray or offer your respects to each of the following figures, or not? e. Protector spirits/guardian deities of the area where you live

var.name: QFIGURESh
var.labl: QFIGURESh. Do you currently pray or offer your respects to each of the following figures, or not? h. Jesus Christ

var.name: QFIGURESi
var.labl: QFIGURESi. Do you currently pray or offer your respects to each of the following figures, or not? i. Guanyin, or the Guanyi Bodhisattva

var.name: QFIGURESj
var.labl: QFIGURESj. Do you currently pray or offer your respects to each of the following figures, or not? j. Allah

var.name: Q38a
var.labl: Q38a. If you were planning the funeral for a family member/loved one, how important would it be to...? a. Invite [a monk or learned person/an imam or sheikh/a priest or pastor/a pundit or learned person] to recite sacred texts or preach

var.name: Q38b
var.labl: Q38b. If you were planning the funeral for a family member/loved one, how important would it be to...? b. Offer donations in the name of the deceased relative

var.name: Q38c
var.labl: Q38c. If you were planning the funeral for a family member/loved one, how important would it be to...? c. Set up [a shrine/ an altar] for the deceased relative

var.name: Q38g
var.labl: Q38g. If you were planning the funeral for a family member/loved one, how important would it be to...? g. Perform rituals in [temples, pagodas or dhamma halls/mosques/churches] for the soul of the deceased relative

var.name: Q39a
var.labl: Q39a. Do you or someone in your household perform rituals on each of the following occasions, or not? a. On the death anniversary of a deceased loved one

var.name: Q39b
var.labl: Q39b. Do you or someone in your household perform rituals on each of the following occasions, or not? b. On other special days

var.name: Q40a
var.labl: Q40a. Do you have a family gravesite where the remains of deceased family members reside, or not?

var.name: Q40b
var.labl: Q40b. Do you or someone in your household pay money to maintain the family gravesite, or not?

var.name: Q40c
var.labl: Q40c. Do you or someone in your household look after the family gravesite by sweeping or cleaning it?

var.name: Q41b
var.labl: Q41b. Do you think each of the following statements is true, or not? b. A person can know the afterlife destination or the destination of rebirth for a deceased family member

var.name: Q41d
var.labl: Q41d. Do you think each of the following statements is true, or not? d. A person can feel the presence of a deceased family member

var.name: Q46a
var.labl: Q46a. Do you think each of the following things exists, or not? a. evil eye

var.name: Q46b
var.labl: Q46b. Do you think each of the following things exists, or not? b. rebirth

var.name: Q46c
var.labl: Q46c. Do you think each of the following things exists, or not? c. fate

var.name: Q46d
var.labl: Q46d. Do you think each of the following things exists, or not? d. spells, curses or other magic influencing people's lives

var.name: Q46e
var.labl: Q46e. Do you think each of the following things exists, or not? e. heaven

var.name: Q46f
var.labl: Q46f. Do you think each of the following things exists, or not? f. hell

var.name: Q46g
var.labl: Q46g. Do you think each of the following things exists, or not? g. Judgement Day

var.name: Q46h
var.labl: Q46h. Do you think each of the following things exists, or not? h. Nirvana

var.name: Q46i
var.labl: Q46i. Do you think each of the following things exists, or not? i. Moksha

var.name: Q46j
var.labl: Q46j. Do you think each of the following things exists, or not? j. Karma

var.name: Q46k
var.labl: Q46k. Do you think each of the following things exists, or not? k. angels or helpful deities

var.name: Q46l
var.labl: Q46l. Do you think each of the following things exists, or not? l. demons or evil deities

var.name: Q48d
var.labl: Q48d. Have you had the following experiences, or not? d. Changed your fate by performing rituals

var.name: Q48e
var.labl: Q48e. Have you had the following experiences, or not? e. Visited a medium to communicate with a spirit

var.name: Q49a
var.labl: Q49a. How often, if at all, do you have each of the following experiences? a. the feeling of being protected by an unseen power

var.name: Q49b
var.labl: Q49b. How often, if at all, do you have each of the following experiences? b. the feeling of being attacked by an unseen power

var.name: Q50
var.labl: Q50. How often do you pray, if at all?

var.name: Q51
var.labl: Q51. Do you pray five salah every day, or not?

var.name: Q54
var.labl: Q54. Is there an altar or shrine in your home, or not?

var.name: Q57
var.labl: Q57. How important is it for you to make merit in your life, if at all?

var.name: Q58b
var.labl: Q58b. Do you ever do each of the following practices, or not? b. Practice meditation

var.name: Q58c
var.labl: Q58c. Do you ever do each of the following practices, or not? c. Burn incense

var.name: Q58d
var.labl: Q58d. Do you ever do each of the following practices, or not? d. Do Tai Chi

var.name: Q58f
var.labl: Q58f. Do you ever do each of the following practices, or not? f. Use special objects for blessings or protection

var.name: Q70a
var.labl: Q70a. Do you think it is acceptable or unacceptable for a person to do each of the following things? a. Try to persuade others to join his or her religion

var.name: Q70c
var.labl: Q70c. Do you think it is acceptable or unacceptable for a person to do each of the following things? c. Leave [RELSYS] for another religion

var.name: QLEGAL
var.labl: QLEGAL. Do you strongly favor, somewhat favor, somewhat oppose or strongly oppose allowing gays and lesbians to marry legally?

var.name: Q74
var.labl: Q74. Overall, do you think having people of many different religions, ethnic groups and cultures makes this country a better place to live, a worse place to live or doesn't make much difference either way?

var.name: Q75a
var.labl: Q75a. Overall do you think each of the following religions is very peaceful, somewhat peaceful, not very peaceful or not at all peaceful? a. Buddhism

var.name: Q75b
var.labl: Q75b. Overall do you think each of the following religions is very peaceful, somewhat peaceful, not very peaceful or not at all peaceful? b. Islam

var.name: Q75c
var.labl: Q75c. Overall do you think each of the following religions is very peaceful, somewhat peaceful, not very peaceful or not at all peaceful? c. Christianity

var.name: Q75d
var.labl: Q75d. Overall do you think each of the following religions is very peaceful, somewhat peaceful, not very peaceful or not at all peaceful? d. Hinduism

var.name: Q78a
var.labl: Q78a. Would you be willing to accept each of the following people as neighbors, or not? a. Buddhists

var.name: Q78b
var.labl: Q78b. Would you be willing to accept each of the following people as neighbors, or not? b. Muslims

var.name: Q78c
var.labl: Q78c. Would you be willing to accept each of the following people as neighbors, or not? c. Christians

var.name: Q78d
var.labl: Q78d. Would you be willing to accept each of the following people as neighbors, or not? d. Hindus

var.name: Q78e
var.labl: Q78e. Would you be willing to accept each of the following people as neighbors, or not? e. People who practice Chinese traditional religions

var.name: Q78f
var.labl: Q78f. Would you be willing to accept each of the following people as neighbors, or not? f. People who practice local beliefs/indigenous religions

var.name: Q80a
var.labl: Q80a. Do you think each of the following religions is compatible with or incompatible with [DEMONYM] culture and values? a. Buddhism

var.name: Q80b
var.labl: Q80b. Do you think each of the following religions is compatible with or incompatible with [DEMONYM] culture and values? b. Islam

var.name: Q80c
var.labl: Q80c. Do you think each of the following religions is compatible with or incompatible with [DEMONYM] culture and values? c. Christianity

var.name: Q80d
var.labl: Q80d. Do you think each of the following religions is compatible with or incompatible with [DEMONYM] culture and values? d. Hinduism

var.name: Q80e
var.labl: Q80e. Do you think each of the following religions is compatible with or incompatible with [DEMONYM] culture and values? e. Chinese traditional religions

var.name: Q80f
var.labl: Q80f. Do you think each of the following religions is compatible with or incompatible with [DEMONYM] culture and values? f. Local beliefs/indigenous religions

var.name: Q81a
var.labl: Q81a. How important, if at all, do you think each is to being truly [DEMONYM]? a. To be able to speak [Khmer/Bahasa Indonesia/Bahasa Malaysia/Mandarin Chinese/Sinhala/Thai]

var.name: Q81b
var.labl: Q81b. How important, if at all, do you think each is to being truly [DEMONYM]? b. To be able to speak Tamil

var.name: Q81c
var.labl: Q81c. How important, if at all, do you think each is to being truly [DEMONYM]? c. To be able to speak Singlish

var.name: Q81d
var.labl: Q81d. How important, if at all, do you think each is to being truly [DEMONYM]? d. To be [Buddhist/Muslim]

var.name: Q81e
var.labl: Q81e. How important, if at all, do you think each is to being truly [DEMONYM]? e. To respect [COUNTRY]'s institutions and laws

var.name: Q81f
var.labl: Q81f. How important, if at all, do you think each is to being truly [DEMONYM]? f. To be [Khmer ethnicity/pribumi/bumiputera/of Chinese descent/Sinhalese/Thai ethnicity]

var.name: Q81g
var.labl: Q81g. How important, if at all, do you think each is to being truly [DEMONYM]? g. To have been born in [COUNTRY]

var.name: Q81h
var.labl: Q81h. How important, if at all, do you think each is to being truly [DEMONYM]? h. To be polite and welcoming

var.name: Q81i
var.labl: Q81i. How important, if at all, do you think each is to being truly [DEMONYM]? i. To be willing to support [COUNTRY] when others criticize it

var.name: Q82
var.labl: Q82. Please tell me if you completely agree, somewhat agree, somewhat disagree or completely disagree with the following statement: [DENOMNYM] people are not perfect, but [DENOMNYM] culture is superior to others

var.name: Q86a
var.labl: Q86a. Should religious leaders do each of the following things, or not? a. talk publicly about what politicans or political parties they support

var.name: Q86b
var.labl: Q86b. Should religious leaders do each of the following things, or not? b. be politicians

var.name: Q86c
var.labl: Q86c. Should religious leaders do each of the following things, or not? c. participate in political protests

var.name: Q86d
var.labl: Q86d. Should religious leaders do each of the following things, or not? d. vote in political elections

var.name: Q87
var.labl: Q87. Do you personally feel that using violence against people because of their political beliefs or religion can often be justified, sometimes be justified, rarely be justified or never be justified?

var.name: Q88a
var.labl: Q88a. Do you favor or oppose basing the law on Buddhist dharma in [IN INDONESIA OR MALAYSIA: “the areas where Buddhists are a majority”/ IN OTHER COUNTRIES: [COUNTRY]]?

var.name: Q88b
var.labl: Q88b. Do you favor or oppose making sharia the official law of the land in [IN SINGAPORE, SRI LANKA AND THAILAND: “the areas where Muslims are a majority”; IN INDONESIA AND MALAYSIA: [COUNTRY]]?

var.name: Q96a
var.labl: Q96a. Do you think each of the following is a threat to Buddhism in [COUNTRY], or not? a. Tourists from other countries

var.name: Q96b
var.labl: Q96b. Do you think each of the following is a threat to Buddhism in [COUNTRY], or not? b. The influence of China

var.name: Q96c
var.labl: Q96c. Do you think each of the following is a threat to Buddhism in [COUNTRY], or not? c. The influence of the United States

var.name: Q96d
var.labl: Q96d. Do you think each of the following is a threat to Buddhism in [COUNTRY], or not? d. The growing number of Muslims

var.labl: Q96e. Do you think each of the following is a threat to Buddhism in [COUNTRY], or not? e. The growing number of Christians

var.name: Q96f
var.labl: Q96f. Do you think each of the following is a threat to Buddhism in [COUNTRY], or not? f. Buddhist extremists

var.name: Q97a
var.labl: Q97a. Do you think each of the following is a threat to Islam in [COUNTRY], or not? a. Tourists from other countries

var.name: Q97b
var.labl: Q97b. Do you think each of the following is a threat to Islam in [COUNTRY], or not? b. The influence of China

var.name: Q97c
var.labl: Q97c. Do you think each of the following is a threat to Islam in [COUNTRY], or not? c. The influence of the United States

var.name: Q97d
var.labl: Q97d. Do you think each of the following is a threat to Islam in [COUNTRY], or not? d. The growing number of Christians

var.name: Q97e
var.labl: Q97e. Do you think each of the following is a threat to Islam in [COUNTRY], or not? e. The growing number of Buddhists

var.name: Q97f
var.labl: Q97f. Do you think each of the following is a threat to Islam in [COUNTRY], or not? f. Muslim extremists

var.name: Q98a
var.labl: Q98a. Do you think it is appropriate or inappropriate for non-Buddhist people from other countries to do the following things? a. Wear images of Buddha or other Buddhist symbols

var.name: Q98b
var.labl: Q98b. Do you think it is appropriate or inappropriate for non-Buddhist people from other countries to do the following things? b. Have Buddhist symbols or images tattooed on their body wherever they like

var.name: Q98c
var.labl: Q98c. Do you think it is appropriate or inappropriate for non-Buddhist people from other countries to do the following things? c. Visit Buddhist temples, pagodas or dhamma halls for tourism

var.name: Q98d
var.labl: Q98d. Do you think it is appropriate or inappropriate for non-Buddhist people from other countries to do the following things? d. Participate in Buddhist practices such as meditation and chanting

var.name: Q98e
var.labl: Q98e. Do you think it is appropriate or inappropriate for non-Buddhist people from other countries to do the following things? e. Marry Buddhists from [COUNTRY]

var.name: qedukhm
var.labl: QEDUKHM. What is the highest level of school you have completed or the highest degree you have received, if any?

catgry.labl: Secondary school [Grade 7-9 completed and receives lower secondary education diploma, Grade 10 incomplete]
High school [Grade 10-12 completed and receives upper secondary educational diploma]
Secondary or post-secondary level technical or vocational training [Technical/vocational Certificate 1, 2, or 3; teac
Bachelor's degree [including Bachelor of Technology or Bachelor of Engineering]

var.name: qeduidn
var.labl: QEDUIDN. What is the highest level of school you have completed or the highest degree you have received, if any?

catgry.labl: Did not finish elementary school (grade 1-5 SD) or Madrasah Ibtidaiyah
Finished elementary school (finishing class 6 SD) or Madrasah Ibtidaiyah
Did not finish first school (class 7-8, SMP); Incomp. junior h.s. (comp. sec. grades 7-8), Madrasah Tsanawiyah or SMP...
Finished Junior High School (SMP, class 9), Madrasah Tsanawiyah or SMP Kejuruan
Did not finish high school (class 10-11, SMA); Incomp. h.s. (comp. h.s. grades 10-11), Did not finish Madrasah Aliyah or
Finished High School (class 12, SMA), Madrasah Aliyah or Sekolah Menengah Kejuruan
Diploma programmes (DIV) or Program Sarjana (Bachelors Degree/S1)
Program Spesialis 1 (Graduate diploma) and Profesi Dokter (Medical Doctor Diploma)

var.name: qedumys
